705510f-a.title: Brooklyn: Lott Place - 40th Street (East)
705510f-a.text:
Lott Place, west from East 40th Street to Flatbush Ave. Also seen is
Flatbush Ave., between Flatlands Ave., and Kings Highway, showing the Marine
Theatre,a'movie-house, in the center.
October 1928.
Eugene L. Armbruster Coilection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
